reference.title: Comment resolution log
reference.shortdesc: The table summarizes the comments that were received during the 15-day review of DITA 1.3 Errata 02 and their resolution. Comments came to both the dita-comment and DITA TC mailing lists.

section.p: A status of "Completed" in the Disposition column indicates that the editor has implemented the changes on which the TC decided, which are outlined in the Resolution column. It also is a hyperlink to the GitHub pull request or commit.
The item number is a hyperlink to the e-mail on the dita-comment or DITA TC mailing lists.

strow.stentry: Public identifiers for machinery task constraint and classification domain changed from DITA 1.2;
